ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
AND( (Directors_Officers_Employment_Practice__c = TRUE),
OR(
AND( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$2,500"), OR( Account_Mailing_State__c = "California", Account_Mailing_State__c = "Florida", Account_Mailing_State__c = "Georgia", Account_Mailing_State__c = "Illinois", Account_Mailing_State__c = "Massachusetts", Account_Mailing_State__c = "New York", Account_Mailing_State__c = "Texas")),
AND( Account_Mailing_State__c = "California", ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$2,500") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Retention Value is not available in this state
